common.subtitle: Create events effortlessly with your friends

login.title: Sign in conveniently with your email
login.securityWarning: For security reasons, you cannot immediately request a new code.
login.error: An error occurred, please try again

token.title: Verification
token.heading: Check your emails
token.description: We have sent a 6-digit code to {{email}}. Please enter the code shown below

onboarding.description: So that your friends can find you without problems, please provide the following information. All details are optional.

events.title: Events
events.transferDescription: Choose someone who will now lead the event.
events.transferConfirm: Do you want to transfer the event to {{name}}?
events.name: Event Name

guests.title: Guests
guests.reviewDescription: Review the guest invitations once more. Then you can invite the guests.
guests.leaveEventConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave the event?

friends.title: Your Friends
friends.startSearch: Start a search to add new friends
friends.declineConfirm: Are you sure you want to decline the request from {{name}}?
friends.unfriendConfirm: Do you want to end your friendship with {{name}}?

profile.title: Profile
profile.deleteAccountWarning: We're sorry you want to delete your account.
profile.deleteAccountEventsWarning: Please note that deleting your account will also delete all events you created, unless you transfer them to someone else beforehand.
profile.deleteAccountCreatorWarning: You still have events where you are registered as creator.
profile.deleteAccountCreatorWarning2: If you delete your account, your created events will also be deleted.
profile.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

share.title: Share {{eventName}}
share.scanQR: Let your guests scan this QR code

creator.warningNoAdmin: Warning! You are registered as the creator of the event and there is currently no other managing guest.
creator.transferOrDelete: Please choose a new manager for the event. Alternatively, you can delete the event.
creator.noOtherGuests: Unfortunately, there are no other participants for this event yet, so you cannot transfer the event to anyone.
creator.notifyGuests: If you still don't want to cancel the event, let participants know that participation must be confirmed in order to transfer the event.
creator.canStillDelete: You can of course still delete the event if you want.
